verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak בְּנֵה־ <S%H1129><s%> Build לִ֥י בָזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> here שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> me here seven מִזְבְּחֹ֑ת <S%H4196><s%> altars וְהָכֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> and prepare לִי֙ בָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> here שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> me here seven פָרִ֖ים <S%H6499><s%> oxen וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֵילִֽים׃ <S%H352><s%> rams

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did בָּלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> as Balaam וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> offered בָּלָ֧ק <S%H1111><s%> and Balak וּבִלְעָ֛ם <S%H1109><s%> and Balaam פָּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> on [every] altar

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָ֜ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam לְבָלָ֗ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak הִתְיַצֵּב֮ <S%H3320><s%> Stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside עֹלָתֶךָ֒ <S%H5930><s%> by thy burnt offering וְאֵֽלְכָ֗ה <S%H1980><s%> will go אוּלַ֞י <S%H194><s%> perhaps יִקָּרֵ֤ה <S%H7136><s%> will come יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> peradventure the LORD לִקְרָאתִ֔י <S%H7125><s%> to meet וּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> me and whatsoever מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> He יַּרְאֵ֖נִי <S%H7200><s%> he sheweth וְהִגַּ֣דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> me I will tell לָ֑ךְ וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שֶֽׁפִי׃ <S%H8205><s%> to an high place

וַיִּקָּ֥ר <S%H7136><s%> met אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> seven הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹת֙ <S%H4196><s%> altars עָרַ֔כְתִּי <S%H6186><s%> unto him I have prepared וָאַ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> and I have offered פָּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> upon [every] altar

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> a word בְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth בִלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> in Balaam's וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> Return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak וְכֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus תְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> and thus thou shalt speak

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> And he returned אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נִצָּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> unto him and lo he stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside עֹלָת֑וֹ <S%H5930><s%> by his burnt sacrifice ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> he and all the princes מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from אֲ֠רָם <S%H758><s%> me from Aram יַנְחֵ֨נִי <S%H5148><s%> hath brought בָלָ֤ק <S%H1111><s%> Balak מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> out of the mountains קֶ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the east לְכָה֙ <S%H1980><s%> Come אָֽרָה־ <S%H779><s%> curse לִּ֣י יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> me Jacob וּלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> and come זֹעֲמָ֥ה <S%H2194><s%> defy יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How אֶקֹּ֔ב <S%H5344><s%> shall I curse לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall I קַבֹּ֖ה <S%H6895><s%> hath not cursed אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> whom God וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How אֶזְעֹ֔ם <S%H2194><s%> ? or how shall I defy לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not זָעַ֖ם <S%H2194><s%> hath not defied יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [whom] the LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> from מֵרֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> For from the top צֻרִים֙ <S%H6697><s%> of the rocks אֶרְאֶ֔נּוּ <S%H7200><s%> I see וּמִגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> him and from the hills אֲשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> I behold הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold עָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> him lo the people לְבָדָ֣ד <S%H910><s%> alone יִשְׁכֹּ֔ן <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell וּבַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִתְחַשָּֽׁב׃ <S%H2803><s%> and shall not be reckoned

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who מָנָה֙ <S%H4487><s%> Who can count עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> the dust יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּמִסְפָּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> and the number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֣בַע <S%H7255><s%> of the fourth יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel תָּמֹ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> crying נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> any מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death יְשָׁרִ֔ים <S%H3477><s%> of the righteous וּתְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרִיתִ֖י <S%H319><s%> and let my last כָּמֹֽהוּ׃ <S%H3644><s%> be like

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> And Balak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam מֶ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> What hast thou done לִ֑י לָקֹ֤ב <S%H6895><s%> thee to curse אֹיְבַי֙ <S%H341><s%> mine enemies לְקַחְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H3947><s%> unto me? I took וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בֵּרַ֥כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> and behold thou hast blessed בָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> [them] altogether

וַיַּ֖עַן <S%H6030><s%> And he answered וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הֲלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what יָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> hath put יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that which the LORD בְּפִ֔י <S%H6310><s%> according אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶשְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> Must I not take heed לְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> to speak

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> then בָּלָ֗ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak [לְךָ־ כ] (לְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> come ק) <S%H1980><s%> come אִתִּ֜י <S%H854><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place אַחֵר֙ <S%H312><s%> I pray thee with me unto another אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּרְאֶ֣נּוּ <S%H7200><s%> from whence thou mayest see מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶ֚פֶס <S%H657><s%> but קָצֵ֣הוּ <S%H7097><s%> the utmost תִרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> them thou shalt see וְכֻלּ֖וֹ <S%H3605><s%> all לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and will not תִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> part of them and shalt not see וְקָבְנוֹ־ <S%H6895><s%> them all and curse לִ֖י מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּקָּחֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And he brought שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> him into the field צֹפִ֔ים <S%H6839><s%> of Zophim אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֑ה <S%H6449><s%> of Pisgah וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> and built שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> seven מִזְבְּחֹ֔ת <S%H4196><s%> altars וַיַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered פָּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> on [every] altar

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak הִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> Stand כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> here עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside עֹלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5930><s%> by thy burnt offering וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> myself אִקָּ֥רֶה <S%H7136><s%> while I meet כֹּֽה׃ <S%H3541><s%> [the LORD] yonder

וַיִּקָּ֤ר <S%H7136><s%> met יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> a word בְּפִ֑יו <S%H6310><s%> in his mouth וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> Go again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak וְכֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> and thus תְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> and say

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> And when he came אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him וְהִנּ֤וֹ <S%H2009><s%> behold נִצָּב֙ <S%H5324><s%> to him behold he stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside עֹ֣לָת֔וֹ <S%H5930><s%> by his burnt offering וְשָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and the princes מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ בָּלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> with him And Balak מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto him What hath the LORD

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said ק֤וּם <S%H6965><s%> Rise up בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> Balak וּֽשֲׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> hearken עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> against בְּנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> unto me thou son צִפֹּֽר׃ <S%H6834><s%> of Zippor

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [is] not a man אֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> God וִֽיכַזֵּ֔ב <S%H3576><s%> that he should lie וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> neither the son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְיִתְנֶחָ֑ם <S%H5162><s%> that he should repent הַה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> has He אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> hath he said וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and shall he not do וְדִבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> [it]? or hath he spoken וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְקִימֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H6965><s%> and shall he not make it good

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> [commandment] to bless לָקָ֑חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> Behold I have received וּבֵרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and he hath blessed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֲשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7725><s%> and I cannot reverse

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִבִּ֥יט <S%H5027><s%> He hath not beheld אָ֙וֶן֙ <S%H205><s%> iniquity בְּיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> in Jacob וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor רָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> neither hath he seen עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> perverseness בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֙ <S%H430><s%> his God עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וּתְרוּעַ֥ת <S%H8643><s%> [is] with him and the shout מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of a king בּֽוֹ׃

אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> God מוֹצִיאָ֣ם <S%H3318><s%> brought them out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כְּתוֹעֲפֹ֥ת <S%H8443><s%> he hath as it were the strength רְאֵ֖ם <S%H7214><s%> of an unicorn לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> there לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no נַ֙חַשׁ֙ <S%H5173><s%> Surely [there is] no enchantment בְּיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> against Jacob וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor קֶ֖סֶם <S%H7081><s%> neither [is there] any divination בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel כָּעֵ֗ת <S%H6256><s%> according to this time יֵאָמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> it shall be said לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and of Israel מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what פָּ֖עַל <S%H6466><s%> wrought אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> What hath God

הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold עָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> Behold the people כְּלָבִ֣יא <S%H3833><s%> as a great lion יָק֔וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall rise up וְכַאֲרִ֖י <S%H738><s%> himself as a young lion יִתְנַשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> and lift up לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> It will not יִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> he shall not lie down עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יֹ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> until he eat טֶ֔רֶף <S%H2964><s%> [of] the prey וְדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> the blood חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> of the slain יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drink

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> And Balak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> not קֹ֖ב <S%H6895><s%> them at all לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקֳּבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5344><s%> Neither curse גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בָּרֵ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> nor bless לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְבָרֲכֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> them at all

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> But Balaam וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak הֲלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> Told אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> not I thee saying כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speaketh יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> All that the LORD אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶֽעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> that I must do

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> And Balak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam לְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> come נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶקָּ֣חֲךָ֔ <S%H3947><s%> I pray thee I will bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> thee unto another אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> perhaps יִישַׁר֙ <S%H3477><s%> convenient בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> affliction הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God וְקַבֹּ֥תוֹ <S%H6895><s%> that thou mayest curse לִ֖י מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> brought בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> unto the top הַפְּע֔וֹר <S%H6465><s%> of Peor הַנִּשְׁקָ֖ף <S%H8259><s%> that looketh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> toward הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <S%H3452><s%> Jeshimon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak בְּנֵה־ <S%H1129><s%> Build לִ֥י בָזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> here שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> me here seven מִזְבְּחֹ֑ת <S%H4196><s%> altars וְהָכֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> and prepare לִי֙ בָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> here שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> me here seven פָרִ֖ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֵילִֽים׃ <S%H352><s%> rams

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did בָּלָ֔ק <S%H1111><s%> And Balak כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> had said בִּלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> as Balaam וַיַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered פָּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> a bullock וָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> on [every] altar
